name: Mengyue Wu
content: Homepage of Mengyue Wu Basics Associate Professor, PhD Supervisor X-LANCE LAB Department of Computer Science and Engineering Shanghai Jiao Tong University Address : 3-543 SEIEE Building, 800 Dongchuan Road, Shanghai 200240, China Email : mengyuewu@sjtu.edu.cn Research SJTU X-LANCE Lab 上海交通大学跨媒体语言智能实验室丰富音频研究组 Environment Sound Sound event and scene detection, generation (!almost every student interested in genreation now..) Audio caption, bridging the gap between audio analysis and natural language description Audio-visual event detection Animal language decoding, now puppy language, in expansion Human Speech: Medical Application Speech emotion analysis Depression/Parkinson’s/Alzheimer’s disease detection Acoustic-based disease diagnosis, e.g. coughing, voice, heartsound… Digital Mental Health: Text and Dialogue Large Language Model for mental health Social media based disease detection and causal mining Dialogue based depression/anxiety diagnosis and therapy - building psychiatrist and therapist bots! Fun! Open-Sourced Data and Models CogBench: A Cognitive Evaluation Benchmark of Image Reasoning and Description for LLM PsySym: An Interpretable Mental Health Symptom Detection Dataset and Model. ( EMNLP'22 ) PsyEx: Detection of Multiple Mental Disorders from Social Media with Two-Stream Psychiatric Experts.
